value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You are the ocean's gray waves...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Commander Anna?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|O, Alfonse! Draw close and listen
well. It is of tragedy I sing—calamity
and woe!$k$pThe enemy has struck! A shadow
most dark falls upon Heroes of dance
and song!$k$pWe have no choice. We must resist!
The Order of Heroes does now
bravely march!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Commander Anna has been listening
to a lot of opera lately...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|I lost myself for a moment there!$k$pThe image of a performing arts
festival in peril filled me with a desire
to sing. Music has strange power!$k$p$EFace_Cool|Well, that's enough of that. You
get the picture. Let's get going!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_舞踏祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_dance17,Face|Who's this, then? You're bold ones,
interrupting our merrymaking!$k$pYou aim to intrude on the sanctity of
the proscenium? Unforgivable!$k$pLadies and gentlemen, stand back! I'll
make quick work of this rabble!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭黒アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_dance17,Face|Hmm... Do I know him? No, I must be
imagining it...$k$pEven so, I must agree! We cannot let
this stage be defiled. You'll be facing
me, too!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_舞踏祭黒アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_dance17,Face|You may have defeated us, but I
won't let you get past me!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_dance17,Face|Don't confront them, lass! We must
not tarry! Take my hand, and we'll
flee!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭黒アクア,ch05_07_Aqua_F_dance17,Face|I suppose you're right. I can take care
of myself, however.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏祭アズール,ch04_19_Azur_M_dance17,Face|Huh? Wait! Wait for me, veiled
maiden, so mysterious and
delightful! Wait!$k$p$Sbs150|
